Articles.Content:
The answer is most certainly pretty easy.

In 0.19 debris cluttered your targetting.

In 0.20, it is not displayed...

But the debris I want to target (and rendevous with) is a half full lifting stage with a docking port. Needless to say, fuel in orbit is a nice thing to have... IF you know where it is.

I can target that stuff easily from the KSC... but not from another vessel.

Some hotkey? How do I switch on debris display in map view? Or do I have to attach some computer probe to it?

Edited May 28, 2013 by Tokay Gris
Soved!
I think on the map view, if you bring your mouse to the center top, you should have a GUI appearing that will allow you to select what to display.

That's what I thought.... dead easy.

Thanks! That solved it!

ImpulseSpaceCenter is right, and left clicking on one of the icons will display only that type of vessel, while right clicking will toggle whether you can see that type.

EDIT: Ninja'd by OP. I don't know how to feel...
